original_text: And the chambers and the entries thereof were by the posts of the gates, where they washed the burnt offering.
korean_text: 그 문 벽 곁에 문이 있는 방이 있는데 그것은 번제물을 씻는 방이며

sentences.original_text: And chambers and entries thereof were by the posts of gates
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그 방들과 출입구는 성문 기둥 옆에 있었으며

sentences.original_text: where they washed the burnt offering
